Webpack App

Simple setup

Al that is needed for a simple webpack setup which will allow us to use javascript modules, is the following:

  1. Run:
    npm init -y
    To create the package.json.
    and install webpack and webpack-cli as a dev dependency:
    npm i webpack webpack-cli -D
  2. Then in the package.json, replace the existing script there with this:
    "build": "webpack --mode production"
    After running that command webpack will compile exerything inside the index.js file and its imported modules to a dist directory as the file main.js.
    Webpack expects the index.js file to be within an src directory.
